code: export function getFormattedDate(dateString){var currentDate=new Date(dateString);var month=currentDate.getMonth();month=month+1;var day=currentDate.getDate();var year=currentDate.getFullYear();if(day<10){day="0"+day;}if(month<10){month="0"+month;}return"".concat(day,"/").concat(month,"/").concat(year);}
